description:
'''''Kabareh Cheikhats''''' ({{Langx|ar|كابريه الشيخات}}) is a Moroccan [[Chaabi (Morocco)|''chaabi'']] (folk music) [[cabaret]] theatrical performance by the troupe ''[[Jouk Attamtil Al Bidaoui]]'' ({{Lang|ar|جوق التمثيل البيضاوي}} "The Casablancan Acting Troupe"), a troupe based out of [[Casablanca]], [[Morocco]].

In the performance, led by [[Ghassan El Hakim]], male actors play the roles of women, paying homage to the ''[[shaykhāt]]'', popular female entertainers such as [[Fatna Bent Lhoucine]] or [[Haja Hamounia]], and the [[Chaabi (Morocco)|''chaabi'']] Moroccan folk tradition.
